long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: BMI Calculator is a simple and useful tool that allows you to calculate your body mass index (BMI) quickly and easily. BMI is a widely-used measure of body fat based on your height and weight, and can be an indicator of your overall health status. With this calculator, you can input your height and weight, and the tool will automatically calculate your BMI and classify you as underweight, normal weight, overweight, or obese. The app can be used by anyone looking to keep track of their body weight and make healthier choices. It's an excellent resource for those interested in maintaining a healthy weight and improving their overall health.
